mapper.select: SELECT id, user_name as username, password, salt, user_role_id as userRoleId, mail, tel, pwd_fail_count as pwdFailCount, is_locked as locked FROM user WHERE mail = #{mail}
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET user_name = #{username}, password = #{password}, user_role_id = #{userRoleId}, pwd_fail_count = #{pwdFailCount}, is_locked = #{locked} WHERE id = #{id}
